ComicInfo.Title: Deadpool Killed the Marvel Universe
ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadpool has already killed every hero in the Marvel Universe. He isn't through. This time, Deadpool's gonna take down the most famous characters in classic literature!
*Notes:* The cover is a homage to the cover of Classics Illustrated #5.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-25 11:22:42. [CVDB381413]
ComicInfo.Characters: Angel, Ares, Arnim Zola, Awesome Andy, Baron Helmut Zemo, Beast, Black Panther, Black Widow, Captain Ahab, Captain America, Carol Danvers, Colossus, Cyclops, Daken, Daredevil, Deadpool, Doctor Octopus, Doctor Strange, Don Quixote, Egghead, Hank Pym, Hawkeye, Hercules, Human Torch, Inspector Lestrade, Iron Fist, Ishmael, Leader, Lizard, Luke Cage, Mad Thinker, Miles Morales, Moby Dick, Mockingbird, Mole Man, Mr. Fantastic, Namor, Nightcrawler, Pinocchio, Quicksilver, Sancho Panza, Sentry, Sherlock Holmes, Spider-Man, Spider-Woman, Thing, Thor, Venom, Wizard, Wolverine
ComicInfo.Teams: A.I.M., Avengers, Scotland Yard, The Crew of the Pequod
ComicInfo.Locations: England, London, New York City, New York State, Pacific Ocean, Spain
